attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - St. Patrick's Event!
attributes.description: Top o' the mornin' to ya! St. Patrick’s is here with a new world, currency, pets, egg, and events!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Comet Update!
attributes.description: Grab an umbrella because it’s raining comets! Comet crashes, pets, and egg! Plus new RAP leaderboards & exclusive pets!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Trading Update!
attributes.description: Trading has leveled up! New trading plaza, auctions board, booth styles, and diamond party! Check it out!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Daycare Update!
attributes.description: Introducing Pet Daycare! Discover a secret area, egg, and chest! Plus more - such as multiple pet enchanting!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Valentine's Event!
attributes.description: Love is in the air! Limited time Valentine's event, currency, pets, eggs, and way more!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Huge Machine Update!
attributes.description: Time for a new machine! Checkout this update with 7 new HUGE pets!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Doodle World Update! (Part 2)
attributes.description: The Doodle world has expanded! Enjoy the new areas, pets, eggs, & giant chest!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Neon Update!
attributes.description: New neon exclusives, secret pet, doodle barn, egg, giant chest, and hoverboard!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Doodle World Update!
attributes.description: Doodle world is here with new pets, eggs, & currency! Plus the new SECRET rarity!

attributes.title: Pet Simulator X - Rainbow Lucky Block Update!
attributes.description: Added Lucki Dominus Pets, Rainbow Lucky Blocks, Trading History, Repeat Button, Keep Settings, Achievements, and more!
